summary: WHILE DRIVING HOME FROM A WEEKEND ON A LAKE WE HAD A FLAT TIRE, INSIDE LEFT REAR, DUE TO THE FLAT THE DAMAGED TIRE CAME IN CONTACT WITH THE WIRING LOOM WHICH IS RAN IN THE WHEEL OF THE MOTOHOME.  THE TIRE THEN BEGAN SPOOLING THE WIRE LOOM BETWEEN THE TWO REAR DUEL TIRES , LIKE A FISHING REAL, CAUSING OVER $7K OF DAMAGE TO THE UNIT.  IT NOT ONLY DAMAGED THE WIRING AND PLUMBING, BUT DESTROYED THE FURNACE THAT IS FEED BY PROPANE.  THE UNIT IS BEING REPAIRED BUT WHEN I CONTACTED THE MFG., I WAS TOLD IT MET GOV. STANDARDS AT THE TIME OF BEING PUT TOGETHER. OF COURSE ALL THE WIRES HAS BEEN CUT OUT,THE BODY SHOP AT THIS TIME STILL HAS THE FURNACE. *JB

1997 P30 CHASSIS MOTORHOME CHEVY AUTO PARKING BRAKE FAILURE IN LESS THAN 10,000 MILES I HAVE HAD TWO BRAKE FAILURES, THIS SYSTEM SHOULD BE RECALLED BY MANUFACTURER. VEHICLE ROLLED BACK AND DAMAGED REAR.*AK

WHILE DRIVING ON HIGH WAY AT ANY SPEED VEHICLE HITS A BUMP OR ANY IRREGULARITY IT SHIMMIES VIOLENTLY.  THIS SHIMMYING ALMOST CAUSES THE VEHICLE TO LOSE CONTROL UNLESS THE VEHICLE IS BROUGHT TO A NEAR STOP.*AK

WHILE DRIVNG THERE WAS A THUMPING NOISE UNDER THE MOTORHOME ON THE PASSENGER'S SIDE. FORD DEALER INSPECTED THE MOTORHOME,  AND STATED THAT THE FRAME WAS CRACKED AND SEPARATED FROM THE FIBERGLASS SKIN. ADVISED CONSUMER TO TALK TO MANUFACTURER. THE MOTORHOME IS BEING SERVICED BY THE SERVICE CENTER.*AK
